content.rendered: George joined Regent in 2019 and is a Google Certified and data-driven marketing professional with extensive digital experience. George possesses a deep understanding of marketing and business practices and has a diverse experience in planning and delivering successful integrated campaigns across performance digital media marketing channels. Within his role, George focusses on Lead Generation & Campaign Optimisation, Paid Search Strategy, Social Media Advertising, Search Engine Optimisation, Content Marketing Strategy, Email Marketing and Automation, Conversion Rate Optimisation, Campaign Reporting, Digital Strategy and Account Management.
